S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-2616
Increase the maximum wait time for tests that start the server. On my windows XP system I would get intermittent failures at the old 60 second max. I believe the issue is turnaround time on the port, rather than a specific startup issue in the code. Setting the max to 300 seconds allowed me to pass a complete nightly test and also passed a reiterated test 30 times that would previously fail every time at the 60 second level.
